original_text: He became hungry and he wanted to eat some food. While someone was preparing a meal for him, Peter had a special dream.
korean_text: 그가 시장하여 먹고자 하매 사람들이 준비할 때에 황홀한 중에

sentences.original_text: and he wanted to eat some food
While someone was preparing a meal for him
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 그를 위해 식사를 준비하는 동안
